name: Borderlands 2 Headhunter 1: TK Baha's Bloody Harvest
name_original: Borderlands 2 Headhunter 1: TK Baha's Bloody Harvest
description:
Borderlands 2 Headhunter 1: TK Baha's Bloody Harvest is an action, shooter and RPG game developed by Gearbox Software. It was originally released in 2013. 2K Games published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Borderlands 2 Headhunter 1: TK Baha's Bloody Harvest is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
